item.title: Tricking Your Team Isn't The Answer
item.description: Successful phishing attacks - tricking your employees into clicking a link and then taking an action, such as providing information to a fake web page - is the primary vector for ransomware infections.

item.title: Stop Rotating Your Passwords
item.description: I’ve been arguing for years that we in information security aren’t doing anyone any favors when we demand that people use for passwords something impossible to remember, then we demand that they remember it, and then we insist that, for God’s sake, they never write it down.
